nodes.text: The Kerkoidian Defense Force was the planetary defense force of the Kerkoiden homeworld Kerkoidia. During the Clone Wars, many officers from the Kerkoidian Defense Force joined the Confederacy of Independent Systems, including Separatist General Whorm Loathsom and Piar Nagelsa, who led troops in battle against the Galactic Republic. Loathsom had a long history of military service in the defense force.

The Kerkoidian Defense Force was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: On the Front Lines, but was later identified in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. It was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Clone Wars – The Official Episode Guide: Season 1.
